Title: Pilot
Plot: When an unassuming high school chemistry teacher discovers he has a rare form of lung cancer, he decides to team up with a former student and create a top of the line crystal meth in a used RV, to provide for his family once he is gone.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Aaron Hill, Gregory Chase, John Koyama, Max Arciniega Jr.
